subject: Order #SSN1546
description_text:
Hi, I still haven’t received any shipping information regarding my order. I placed this order on the 28th of may.

How long will it take? 

Thank you 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: 你好，Ben Linsdell，  由于 VAM Pro 外壳表面处理延迟，原定于 6 月 10 日发货的 VAM Pro 外壳已推迟至预计 6 月 16 日至 18 日之间。对于由此造成的不便，我们深表歉意。我们正在积极联系外壳供应商，以便按照修改后的时间表加快发货速度。由于采用国际快递，预计运输时间会相对较快。感谢您的理解。

Hi, 

I have the pro x pedals. I brought the VRAM pro for the pedals but I cannot get it working? I am using the control box that came with my pedals. Is this correct or am I doing something wrong?

Could you give me a step by step? Or am I using the wrong control box?

Thank you 
Sent from my iPhone

>
